title: Yescom Semi-automatic Cup Sealing Machine 350W Electric Cup Sealer 400-600 Cups/Hr Milk Boba Tea Coffee Smoothies Sealer
features: [Highly Efficient]: This Cup Sealing Machine with a 90mm cup mold offers a maximum continuous working period of 12 hours, boasting a high working capacity of 400 to 600 cups per hour for fast beverage packaging, making it suitable for commercial and industrial use

[Versatile & Multifunctional]: Designed to seal cups with max height up to 7 1/16" and a diameter of 3 9/16" or 3 3/4", with capacities between 320 to 700ml, while featuring adjustable sealing temperature for catering to different film material, such as PE, PP, PS, PET and easy-tear film

[Easy Operation]: Equipped with a control knob for adjusting temperature within a range of 122 to 482 degrees Fahrenheit to cater to different film and cup materials, along with an electronic sensor which ensures accurate seal alignment, and indicator lights showing the status of the heating process, allowing for smooth operation with low sealing error

[Durable]: Made of sturdy and high-grade sprayed metal, it is built to withstand the harshest work environments, ensuring enhanced durability and a long service life even with frequent and prolonged use

[Wide Application & Safe Use]: This Cup Sealing Machine is ideal for packaging milk tea, soy milk, iced or hot coffee, smoothies and more in restaurants, beverage stores, factories, coffees shops, etc.; UL & CSA certificated power cord for safety assurance
description: Features:- Highly Efficient - This Cup Sealing Machine with a 90mm cup mold offers a maximum continuous working period of 12 hours, boasting a high working capacity of 400 to 600 cups per hour for fast beverage packaging, making it suitable for commercial and industrial use- Versatile & Multifunctional - Designed to seal cups with max height up to 7 1/16" and a diameter of 3 9/16" or 3 3/4", with capacities between 320 to 700ml, while featuring adjustable sealing temperature for catering to different film material, such as PE, PP, PS, PET and easy-tear film- Easy Operation - Control knob for adjusting temperature and electronic sensor to ensure accurate seal alignment- Durable - Sturdy and high-grade sprayed metal ensures durability, withstands the harshest work environments- Wide Application - Ideal for packaging milk tea, soy milk, coffee, smoothies in restaurants, beverage stores, cafe, etc.Specifications:- Overall Dimension: 13 1/16" x 8 15/16" x 24" (33.2 x 22.7 x 61 cm)- Power Cord Length: 4 7/12" (140cm)- Cup Sealing Diameter: 3 9/16", 3 3/4‚Äù (9cm, 9.5cm)- Sealing Temperature (PE): 320 to 374 degrees Fahrenheit (160 to 190 degrees Celsius)- Sealing Temperature (PP): 320 to 410 degrees Fahrenheit (160 to 210 degrees Celsius)- Sealing Temperature (PS): 320 to 374 degrees Fahrenheit (160 to 190 degrees Celsius)- Sealing Temperature (PET): 320 to 392 degrees Fahrenheit (160 to 200 degrees Celsius)- Sealing Temperature (Easy-Tear Film): 248 to 356 degrees Fahrenheit (120 to 180 degrees Celsius)- Voltage: 110V, 60 Hz- Power: 350W- Net Weight: 42 Lbs (19kg)Package Contents:- 1x Cup Sealing Machine- 2x Clamp Plate- 1x Film Collecting Roll- 1x Cup Holder- 2x Spring Clip- 1x Allen Key- 1 Set of Accessories- 1x ManualNotice: - Please notice that sealing film should be suitable for your cup material.
